articles.title: Last gift given to the Queen was a silver brooch with 'poignant' meaning - worth thousands - Express
articles.description: Queen Elizabeth II owned a vast collection of brooches, including some special ones that she wore on rotation. One of the last brooches the late monarch wore was an unique design thought to be the last jewel she was ever gifted before her death earlier this m…

articles.description: Mike Tindall also revealed he is 'full of regret' for not asking the Queen more questions on a special episode of his podcast The Good, The Bad and The Rugby.
